full_text: BE ERE ee Bae 2018/KER/260 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA THURSDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 14TH POUSHA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 8698 of 2017 CC.NO. 201/2017 of GRAMA NYAYALAYA,PARAPPA, KASARAGOD. CRIME NO. 190/2015 OF RAJAPURAM POLICE STATION,KASARGOD. PETITIONER (S) /1ST ACCUSED RAJESH T V, AGED 27 YEARS, S/O. UNNIKRISHNAN, RESIDING AT KEKKADAVAN HOUSE, MAYATHI, PANATHADI VILLAGE, VELLARIKUNDU TALUK, KASARAGOD DISTRICT. BY ADVS.SRI.T.MADHU SMT.C.R.SARADAMANT RESPONDENT (S) /STATE: THE STATE OF KERALA, THROUGH THE STATION HOUSE OFFICER, RAJAPURAM POLICE STATION, KASARAGOD DISTRICT, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM - 682 031. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: TS BE ERE ee Bae 2018/KER/260 Cr1.MC.No. 8698 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER (S)' ANNEXURES ANNEXURE Al THE TRUE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO. 190/2015 OF RAJAPURAM POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE A2 THE TRUE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 190/2015 OF RAJAPURAM POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE A3 THE TRUE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE JUDGMENT DATED 23.10.2017 IN CC NO .3/2016 ON THE FILES OF THE GRAMA NYAYALAYA, PARAPPA, WEST ELERI. RESPONDENT (S)' ANNEXURES - NIL /TRUE COPY/ PS TO JUDGE TS BE 2018/KER/260 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. ee ORDER Originally, the petitioner was the 1* accused in C.C.No.3/2016 of the Grama Nyayalaya, Parappa, West, Eleri, for the offences punishable under Sections 447 and 427 read with Section 34 IPC. 2. In fact, all the specific allegations were against the 2 accused in the case. A2 to A4 faced the trial before the Grama Nyayalaya and they were acquitted by the Grama Nyayalaya for want of evidence through Annexure- A3 judgment. 3. The case against the petitioner is now pending as C.C.201/2017 of the Grama Nyayalaya, Parappa. On going through Annexure A3 judgment, it seems that even if the trial BREE 2018/KER/260 CRL.M.C.No. 8698 of 2017 uoe against the petitioner is proceeded with, no fruitful purpose would be served and therefore, all further proceedings in C.C.201/2017 of the Grama Nyayalaya, Parappa, West, Eleri, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings in C.C.201/2017 of the Grama Nyayalaya, Parappa, West, Eleri, as against the petitioner, are hereby quashed. Sd/- B. KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE. w // true copy // PS. to Judge.
